basics.name: Martin Pintos
basics.label: Versatile Frontend Developer committed to creating sleek and immersive user experiences
basics.summary: With over four years of experience, I've honed my skills in developing applications using TypeScript, React, React Native, and Next.js. My approach covers the entire development cycle, adapting to diverse environments and prioritizing user experience. I excel in collaborating with teams to drive innovation and maintain high-quality standards in every project.

work.name: Inmind Software
work.summary:
Led development and lifecycle management of over ten web and mobile applications, leveraging React and React Native for optimal user experience. Integrated native modules and APIs for seamless Android and iOS functionality. Enhanced front-end performance and fostered code reusability, significantly improving application responsiveness and development efficiency.

Enhanced user interaction through advanced animations and kept applications up to date to ensure satisfaction and relevance. Supervised app store submissions, expanding our market reach. Implemented solutions with AWS, Expo, and Firebase to ensure scalability and robustness, and ensured that the design of the applications closely aligned with the original requirements.

work.name: HPY Camper
work.summary:
Spearheaded the development of a cross-platform app for iOS and Android, utilizing a comprehensive tech stack that included TypeScript, Redux, React Hooks, Python, Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS, GitLab, Expo, and Tailwind CSS, with core development in React Native.

Incorporated critical functionalities such as Firebase push notifications, Firebase Analytics, React Navigation, Adyen, LocalAuth and Async Storage, markedly improving app usability and elevating the user experience.

work.name: Unitech
work.summary:
Pioneered the creation and integration of a virtual assistant using IBM Watson in a web and mobile app, improving the user experience. Developed a broad suite of automated tests with TestProject and JUnit, enhancing software quality and expediting release cycles through the adoption of Jenkins and GitLab for continuous integration.

Implemented custom dashboards with data from Jira to optimize project management and developed REST services in Java for better data management. Additionally, I updated interfaces using Angular, improving usability and modernizing existing applications.

education.studyType: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence)

projects.name: Newsaki
projects.description: Web application for obtaining information about anime and manga

projects.name: Minimalist Portfolio
